name: Gigabyte GM-M8000X Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [Pro Laser 6000DPI gaming-grade sensor, Built-in 32KB GHOSTTM engine supports not only 70 customizable onboard macros on the go, but 45 button assignments, Advanced GHOSTTM Engine Software features Drag & Drop structure, 2 time durable Omron 10 million time switch, Weight tuning 7 combinations of weights, 38grams added]
